Class VirtualArtGalleryControl

java.lang.Object
com.hexaware.controller.VirtualArtGalleryControl
All Implemented Interfaces:
IVirtualArtGallery
public class VirtualArtGalleryControl extends Object implements IVirtualArtGallery
Implementation of the IVirtualArtGalleryControl interface. Manages operations in the Virtual Art Gallery.
